decoworld.server.database.clans

Class PlayerClanDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.database.clans.PlayerClanDAO

  • public class PlayerClanDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements storage of all players in different clans on web database server.
